name: Canopy Tactician
originalText:
Other Elves you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.

rulings.text: Because damage remains marked on creatures until the damage is removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to Elves you control may become lethal if Canopy Tactician leaves the battlefield that turn.
